name: Bluz Skeleton
body:
Bluz, a lightweight PHP Framework ================================= Easy to setup, easy to use. ## Installation Bluz works with PHP 5.4 or later and MySQL 5.1 or later First you should clone Bluz skeleton project from github repository ``` git clone git://github.com/bluzphp/skeleton.git ``` Then you need to download composer.phar ``` curl -s https://getcomposer.org/installer | php ``` After that, you need to install all the necessary project dependencies by this command: ``` php composer.phar install ``` Requried FollowSymlinks option. Create symlink to public directory: ``` ln -s /path/to/public /var/www/htdocs ``` Restore database structure from `structure.ddl` file. Restore default database data from `dump.sql` Edit your own configuration file ```/path/to/application/configs/app.dev.php``` ## Usage Controller: ```php user = Users\Table::getInstance()->findRow($id); }; ``` View: ```php
